title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads DB BR156 / Tadgs / Kijls
description:
DB BR156 / Tadgs / Kijls

The vehicle package contains the series 156 of the DB, including 
the freight cars Tadgs and Kijls. The BR156 is the last in-house development of the Deutsche Reichsbahn. Of this six-axle locomotive four prototypes were produced different electrical equipment. Since the vehicles rebuilt repeatedly in the course of their life history were giving contained in this package cars only a snapshot again. The included mobile models in the series 156 are characterized by from extensive features and therefore are not for beginners suitable in TS and not be moved without first an intensive look at the manual to have thrown !! Take therefore ask the way here on this website in advance the manual download to get an overview of features and requirements to obtain. Please note !! After installing this vehicle package, you get the installer of the DB BR156 a download link for the free BR156 in MEG colors displayed. To load this package, please click on the link that appears. After you have downloaded the package, you can use it with a double-click to install the package. To install the MEG version MUST DB Version of already BR156
